snippet: The two largest groups that oppose President Bashar al-Assad agreed on a common approach to organizing a transitional government.
abstract: Syrian National Council and National Coordination Body for Democratic Change in Syria, two largest groups that oppose Pres Bashar al-Assad, agree on common approach to organizing a transitional government; move could help unify opposition movement divided between exiles and domestic dissidents.
lead_paragraph: The two largest groups that oppose President Bashar al-Assad agreed on a common approach to organizing a transitional government.

headline.main: Syrian Opposition Groups Aim for Unity
headline.print_headline: Syrian Opposition Groups Aim for Unity

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
